columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the connection definition.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection.

columns.name: connection_type
columns.description: The type of the connection. Currently, SFTP is not supported.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time that this connection definition was created.

columns.name: last_updated_by
columns.description: The user, group, or role that last updated this connection definition.

columns.name: last_updated_time
columns.description: The last time that this connection definition was updated.

columns.name: connection_properties
columns.description: These key-value pairs define parameters for the connection.

columns.name: match_criteria
columns.description: A list of criteria that can be used in selecting this connection.

columns.name: physical_connection_requirements
columns.description: A map of physical connection requirements, such as virtual private cloud (VPC) and SecurityGroup, that are needed to make this connection successfully.
